ai-patthana8.59:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.59:1.1_0: without seeing the cause, without reason, because of not seeing, for the sake of not seeing, the reason for the sake of not seeing, the sake of these three conditions,
ai-patthana8.59:2.1_0: Not seeing the cause, not to be given up.
ai-patthana8.59:3.1_0: Not seeing the cause, nor by seeing, it should be given up without seeing, and with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.59:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
